params.jug_: The address of the Dai jug (where SF is kept)
params.jumpMultiplierPerYear: The multiplierPerBlock after hitting a specified utilization point
params.kink_: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied
params.owner_: The address of the owner, i.e. the Timelock contract (which has the ability to update parameters directly)
params.pot_: The address of the Dai pot (where DSR is earned)

returns._0: The Dai savings rate per block (as a percentage, and scaled by 1e18)

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market

returns._0: The borrow rate percentage per block as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

params.borrows: The total amount of borrows the market has outstanding
params.cash: The total amount of cash the market has
params.reserveFactorMantissa: The current reserve factor the market has
params.reserves: The total amnount of reserves the market has

returns._0: The supply rate per block (as a percentage, and scaled by 1e18)

params.baseRatePerYear: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18). For DAI, this is calculated from DSR and SF. Input not used.
params.gapPerYear: The Additional margin per year separating the base borrow rate from the roof. (scaled by 1e18)
params.jumpMultiplierPerYear: The jumpMultiplierPerYear after hitting a specified utilization point
params.kink_: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market (currently unused)

returns._0: The utilization rate as a mantissa between [0, 1e18]

assumedOneMinusReserveFactorMantissa().notice: The assumed (1 - reserve factor) used to calculate the minimum borrow rate (reserve factor = 0.05)

baseRatePerBlock().notice: The base interest rate which is the y-intercept when utilization rate is 0

blocksPerYear().notice: The approximate number of blocks per year that is assumed by the interest rate model

dsrPerBlock().notice: Calculates the Dai savings rate per block

gapPerBlock().notice: The additional margin per block separating the base borrow rate from the roof.

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the current borrow rate per block

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current supply interest rate per block including the Dai savings rate

isInterestRateModel().notice: Indicator that this is an InterestRateModel contract (for inspection)

jumpMultiplierPerBlock().notice: The multiplierPerBlock after hitting a specified utilization point

kink().notice: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied

multiplierPerBlock().notice: The multiplier of utilization rate that gives the slope of the interest rate

owner().notice: The address of the owner, i.e. the Timelock contract, which can update parameters directly

poke().notice: Resets the baseRate and multiplier per block based on the stability fee and Dai savings rate

updateJumpRateModel(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: External function to update the parameters of the interest rate model

utilizationRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `borrows / (cash + borrows - reserves)`

userdoc.notice: The parameterized model described in section 2.4 of the original Compound Protocol whitepaper. Version 3 modifies the interest rate model in Version 2 by increasing the initial "gap" or slope of the model prior to the "kink" from 2% to 4%, and enabling updateable parameters.
